attributes.action: Make it mandatory that the Press Complaints Committee investigate fully all complaints.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the PCC only acknowledges third party compaints. It is necessary that where the Press breaks the Press code that anyone is free to complain and if the PCC finds against that newspaper it must apologise in the next issue and the apology should be the same size as the offending article or picture.
